title: VOLTAGE DROP
fullText:
The voltage drop in cables between the battery system and PCE shall be in accordance with the battery system manufacturer's requirements.
NOTE 1 The voltage drop in cables between the battery system and PCE should be minimized to ensure efficient operation of the system.
NOTE 2 The voltage drop in cables between the battery system and PCE should be less than 1% of the nominal battery system voltage at maximum continuous current.
